tooltips.voipNotifications: If you want to receive incoming/outgoing call notifications.
tooltips.voipInternalCall: Internal click-to-call is a feature to originate an outgoing call. If the checkbox is unchecked, then will be used an external application to handle tel: links.
tooltips.voipAdditionalNumbers: Additional external or internal phone numbers.
tooltips.voipContext: Dial Context for a User. If it is empty, a Dial Context of a connector will be used.
